survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Bike Sharing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of bike sharing services to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use bike sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use bike sharing services?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use bike sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option that allows for open-ended text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an 'Other' text field option.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use bike sharing services?

questions.question_text: Which features do you value the most in a bike sharing service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Limit selections to 3 options to prioritize responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with a max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: Which features do you value the most in a bike sharing service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike sharing service you use?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box for detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike sharing service you use?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the bike sharing service you use most frequently? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with clear labels for each point. Ensure the scale is visually balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons with labels for each number).

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the bike sharing service you use most frequently? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
